item.create_fantasizing.tree_cutter.tool: Cut down an entire tree at once!
Will not cut down the tree.
item.create_fantasizing.block_placer.too: A powerful tool that allows you to _remotely place and destroy large numbers of blocks._ Functions identically to the _Creative Worldshaper_, but _consumes_ blocks and _drops_ the removed or replaced blocks.
When enchanted Fortune or Silk Touch
Blocks will drop based on their enchantments, just like when using a pickaxe.
No longer consumed blocks when placing most _renewable blocks_ such as _Cobblestone_.
block.create_fantasizing.transporter.too: _Transfer_ items from one container to another. Can't extract items from another Transporter!
block.create_fantasizing.phantom_shaft.t: Right-click a _Shaft_ using a _Phantom Membrane_ to convert it into this block. It will still pass stress without collision. Removing it with a _Wrench_ will restore it to a _Shaft_.
block.create_fantasizing.phantom_cogwhee: Right-click a _Cogwheel_ using a _Phantom Membrane_ to convert it into this block. It will still pass stress without collision. Removing it with a _Wrench_ will restore it to a _Cogwheel_.
block.create_fantasizing.phantom_large_c: Right-click a _Large Cogwheel_ using a _Phantom Membrane_ to convert it into this block. It will still pass stress without collision. Removing it with a _Wrench_ will restore it to a _Large Cogwheel_.
create_fantasizing.gui.crate.no_fold.0: Is the container interface out of your screen?
create_fantasizing.gui.crate.no_fold.1: Currently, the only solution to this issue is to resize the interface or enlarge the window.
create_fantasizing.ponder.acc_convert.he: Convert the Alternative Chromatic Compound to other materials.
create_fantasizing.ponder.acc_convert.te: When a light source is present near the Alternative Chromatic Compound, it will gradually transform into Refined Radiance.
The more light sources there are around, the faster the transformation speed.
When dropped into the Beam of an activated Beacon, it will immediately transform into Refined Radiance.
When in close proximity to the void, it will slowly transform into Shadow Steel.
Falling into the void will directly transform it into Shadow Steel.
create_fantasizing.ponder.crate_usage.te: Crate is a type of multi-functional container. You can limit its capacity by adjusting.
Large Crates can be assembled in all three axes.
The crate can be renamed directly, and its custom name will be displayed when it is being pointed at.
The Crate can be used to pack the items inside. When mined or removed by a Wrench...
...when it contains items, a Crate containing the items will drop.
However, other containers or block items with block entities cannot be packed. If a Crate is destroyed or dismantled while these items are in it...
...these items will drop as extra, while the rest will still be packed.
The Crates can be moved by a Contraption, and their capacity limits remain in effect. (But they cannot be opened during movement.)
Crates made of different materials have different maximum capacities.
